item.title: Terraform-quick-notes
item.description: It has been a while since I used Terraform, recently I wanted to refresh my memory. So, I started creating some basic infra in Azure and ADO pipelines. This is for a quick reference - One way to structure TF files, you can also add providers etc in a separate file. Remember to add .gitignore for TF files Commands to create Infra using TF terraform init terraform plan --var-file=filename.tfvars –var-file is optional and depends on your folder structure
